title: AdaniConneX sets benchmark with construction financing framework of $1.44 billion
description: AdaniConneX, a joint venture, raised USD 1.44 billion in India's largest sustainability linked financing. The construction financing pool now stands at USD 1.65 billion, focusing on advanced technologies and environmental solutions, with support from international lenders and industry partners.
